General.Name: Shanghai Hongda New Material Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Hongda New Material Co., Ltd. engages in the processing, production, and sale of silicone rubber and its products primarily in China. It offers raw rubber, mixed rubber, liquid rubber, etc. The company also engages in the provision of information security communication equipment. Its products are used in aviation, cables, electronic appliances, instruments, automobiles, construction, food processing, medical equipment, daily necessities, sex toys, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Hongda New Material Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Shanghai, China.

0.Name: Mr. Jun  Huang
0.Title: Chairman & Acting Sec. of the Board
